about_the_game: The El Prez Pack Upgrade contains an exclusive palace design, the captivating flamingo pond, something every dictator craves to impress his neighbouring states and a tourist costume for El Prez to enjoy those warm caribbean nights adequately. You can also treat your ears to the digital soundtrack, featuring the game's unique and catchy musical score as well as a digital calendar to mark off the days until election day.
detailed_description: The El Prez Pack Upgrade contains an exclusive palace design, the captivating flamingo pond, something every dictator craves to impress his neighbouring states and a tourist costume for El Prez to enjoy those warm caribbean nights adequately. You can also treat your ears to the digital soundtrack, featuring the game's unique and catchy musical score as well as a digital calendar to mark off the days until election day.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS + SteamOS (latest)
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3 GHz (AMD A10 7850K, Intel i3-2000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon HD 7870, Geforce GTX 750)
  • Sound Card: TBC

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave (10.14)
  • Processor: Quad-Core (i5 or i7) 3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon R9 380, Geforce GTX 960)
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
